channel.title: consumer on Ian Wootten
channel.description: Recent content in consumer on Ian Wootten

item.title: Does Threadless rule or not?
item.description: Last night I perused a number of articles describing the success of my favourite t-shirt store threadless, the first of which – over at 37Signals reviews in a positive light and the second in a more negative one.Threadless is a t-shirt company with a difference, it’s a 24-7 competition allow you to become the designer. Designs are chosen by the team, and are able to be rated by the community that operates around the website.
